name: HarshTruths
0:
”Alexa, open harsh truths”
”Give me a harsh truth”
”Tell me the truth”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: harsh truths
des: This skill provides harsh truths. Sometimes, you need someone (or something) to bluntly tell you about life. This skill does that. Maybe it will help to motivate you to do that thing. Maybe it won't. Maybe it will help you turn your life around and do something good and meaningful.
